title: In the Stormlight Archive, who would you like to see as a viewpoint character that hasn't yet been one? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think the easiest answer would be Wit/Hoid, but I don’t think we’ll see his POV until the Dragonsteel series (or Stormlight Archive Era 2 at the earliest). Other than Hoid, I’d also love to get some POVs from someone in Worldhopping groups/organizations on Roshar like Ghostbloods or the Seventeenth Shard. If we’re talking about Rosharans specifically (no OB spoilers), I’m most interested in getting POVs from Jasnah, Gavilar, some of the Heralds (like Nale or Taln) or spren like Syl, Stormfather or Nightwatcher. I think we’re supposed to get Gavilar’s POV in Book 5’s Prologue, and one of Era 2’s books is supposed to be centered around Jasnah’s flashbacks. Apart from those characters, I’m also curious about Axies the Collector. We got small interlude chapter from his POV in WoK and we saw him briefly in the Reshi islands in WoR, and I’d love to have more of his POVs. Edit: I had forgotten that we already got Wit’s POV in the Epilogues of WoK and WoR.
Definitely Gavilar. Nale or Ishar. Nightblood. A Dysian Aimian. Also Taln’s, or some other Herald’s flashbacks of time between Desolations.
